item.title: 23-Year-Old Man Dies in Accident Near Jurala Project in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[A 23-year-old man, identified as Mahesh from A. Budidapadu village in Manavapadu Mandal, lost his life in a accident near the Jurala project in Jogulamba Gadwal district on Sunday evening. The incident occurred around 7 pm when Mahesh, along with his friend Janakiram, was returning on a motorcycle after visiting the project.
A car, reportedly driven rashly from Gadwal towards Atmakur, collided with their bike. The impact caused the motorcycle to lose control, throwing Mahesh into the downstream...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author
